WorkItem.ClosedComment:
I was a bit to soon with my remark.

This is the way that source mapping comments are made. 
I suggest you either alter your bundling code, or strip the sourcemapping code from rateit manually.
WorkItem.Description:
Hi
This comment in jquery.rateit.min.js creates a problem when this file is compressed together other .js files
//@ sourceMappingURL=jquery.rateit.min.js.map
all jquery plugin are blocked
instead if you use this mode all is ok
/* @ sourceMappingURL=jquery.rateit.min.js.map */

Can you change this comment?
thanks

byeeeee
WorkItem.Summary: The comment in jquery.rateit.min.js creates a problem when this file is compressed together other .js files

Comments.Message: this editor has removed the asterisks aboveyou should use the multi line comments
Thank you for reporting the issue. I will update it with the next release.
